sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {addDinosaur} from '../actions/addDinosaur' import { Form, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; class DinosaurInput extends React.Component { state = { name: '', size: '', weight: '', temporal_range: '', year_discovered: '', picture_url: '', summary: '', dino_type_id: this.props.dinoType } handleOnChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } handleOnSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() this.props.addDinosaur(this.state, this.props.url) this.setState( { name: '', size: '', weight: '', temporal_range: '', year_discovered: '', picture_url: '', summary: '', dino_type_id: '' } ) this.collapse() } collapse = () => { let toggleButton = document.getElementById('add') toggleButton.click() } render() { return (
Add a Dinosaur
HINT: You can find most of the info below from the Wikipedia Mesozoic Portal. At a minimum, please include the category, name and picture URL.
Category: When did it live and what kind of dinosaur was it? Dinosaur Name

Dinosaur Size In feet Dinosaur Weight Convert from tons Temporal Range When did it live? Example: 150-140 MYA) Year Discovered

Picture URL Google Images: {this.state.name} Fun Fact or Brief Description
(500 Characters Max)
) } } export default connect(null, {addDinosaur})(DinosaurInput)
